external_games.name: Dungeon Defenders - The Tinkerer's Lab Mission Pack

name: Dungeon Defenders: The Tinkerer's Lab Mission Pack
summary: Embedded within the floating islands of Sky City, the Tinkerer's Lab is the birthplace of the Series EV. Her creator, the Tinkerer, has been preparing for a chasis & software upgrade to EV 1.5, but harnessing the Eternia energy has attracted unwanted attention!
